articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Australian Cricketers' Association backs Tim Paine following resignation as men's Test captain
articles.description: The ACA shows its support for Tim Paine, saying it didn't feel he needed to step down as Australian men's Test captain despite the sexting scandal revelations.
articles.content:
The Australian Cricketers' Association (ACA) has shown support for Tim Paine, saying it is saddened he "felt the need to resign" as Australian men's Test captain.
Paine announced on Friday afternoon… [+1133 chars]

articles.title: Azeem Rafiq apologises after historical antisemitic text messages emerge
articles.description: The former cricketer ‘deeply ashamed’ for remarks and is a ‘different person today’
articles.content:
